replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content:
Cheat        gamemode        essentials.gamemode        Allow access to the /gamemode command.
Cheat        gamemode        essentials.gamemode.others        Allows you to change the gamemode of other players.

输入 /manuaddp 玩家名 essentials.gamemode   试试 

这个权限只能给自己修改 essentials.gamemode.others 可允许给他人修改
